com.rnb.searsapi

Interface StoresSearch

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    StoresSearchImpl

    public interface StoresSearch
    This API is used to retrieve store information , such as basic details of a store, working hours and services offered. This API will allow developers to get information on Sears / Kmart stores available for a city and state, ZIP code, or latitude and longitude given as input. This interface provides following methods : 1. Fetch stores for given zip code
    2. Fetch stores for given city and state
    3. Fetch stores for given longitude and latitude
    4. Fetch stores for given store number
    Author:
    tarung
